name: TheGreatHeist
description:
TheGreatHeist is a game about robbing some jeweleries.

It was made for the first SpeedJam by ScoreSpace in about 3 days.

All art and nearly all programming was done by myself. Unfortunately I didnt find the time to make some music and include some audio.

The only thing I didnt program myself is the the leaderboard creator from Danial Jumagaliyev (https://danqzq.itch.io/leaderboard-creator).

I used the tutorial from samyam (https://www.youtube.com/@samyam) to implement it.
